Table of Contents

Namespace osu.Framework.Utils

Classes

Blur

Helper methods for blur calculations.

General
HasOrderedElementsAttribute

Marker attribute for Enum classes whose members are annotated with OrderAttribute. Methods from the EnumExtensions static class use the order defined with these attributes.

IncrementalBSplineBuilder

A class for incrementally building B-Spline paths from a series of linear points. This can be used to obtain a B-Spline with a minimal number of control points for any given set of linear input points, for example, a hand-drawn path.

Interpolation
MathUtils
NumberFormatter

Exposes functionality for formatting numbers.

OrderAttribute

Allows specifying ordering of Enum members, separate from the actual enum values. Only has an effect on members of Enum classes annotated with HasOrderedElementsAttribute.

PathApproximator

Helper methods to approximate a path by interpolating a sequence of control points.

Precision

Utility class to compare float or double values for equality.

RNG

Static utility class for random number generation.

SourceGeneratorUtils

A set of helper functions for source generators to use in order to simplify their work.

ThrowHelper

Helper class for throwing exceptions in isolated methods, for cases where method inlining is beneficial. As throwing directly in that case causes JIT to disable inlining on the surrounding method.

Validation

Structs

CircularArcProperties
ConvexPolygonClipper<TClip, TSubject>

Interfaces

IInterpolable<TValue>

An interface that defines the interpolation of a value.

Delegates

InterpolationFunc<TValue, TEasing>
